mapper.sql: a.idAirport as idAirport, a.airportName as airportName, a.city as city, a.country as country, a.latitude as latitude, a.longitude as longitude, Airlines.idAirlines as idAirlines, Airlines.airlineName as airlineName, Flight.idFlight as idFlight, Flight.price as price, b.idAirport as arrivalId, b.airportName as arrivalAirport, b.city as arrivalCity, b.country as country, b.latitude as latitude, b.longitude as longitude
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Airport a LEFT JOIN AirlineInAirport aInAirP ON idAirport = aInAirP.Airport_idAirport LEFT JOIN Airlines Airlines ON Airlines.idAirlines = aInAirP.Airlines_idAirlines INNER JOIN Flight ON Airlines.idAirlines = Flight.Airlines_idAirlines AND Flight.idDepartureAirport = a.idAirport Left Join Airport b ON b.idAirport = Flight.idArrivalAirport WHERE a.idAirport = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Airport (airportName, city, country, latitude, longitude) VALUES (#{name}, #{city}, #{country}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})
